about_the_game:
Embark on an adrenaline-pumping adventure across the galaxy in this 2D handmade beat 'em up. In a universe where money is everything, you'll take control of three distinct space bounty hunters, each with their own unique abilities and styles. Hunt down epic criminals, collect bounties, and fight your way through a brutal, unforgiving world where danger lurks at every turn.

Use futuristic motorcycles to traverse planets, engage in intense, bloody combat, and experience a level of gore and action that will keep your heart racing. The game features beautifully crafted handmade animations that bring every punch, kick, and explosion to life with stunning detail.



FEATURES:

- Three Playable Characters: Choose from three unique space bounty hunters, each with their own playstyle and abilities.

- Galaxy-Spanning Bounty Hunts: Travel across diverse planets on your futuristic motorcycle, taking down epic criminals and collecting bounties.

-Brutal Action: Engage in intense combat filled with gore, blood, and non-stop action.

-Handmade 2D Animation: Enjoy beautifully animated characters and environments that bring the world to life.

-Epic Boss Fights: Face off against powerful criminals in challenging boss battles.

-Money-Driven Gameplay: In this universe, money is everything. Earn, steal, and fight for every credit you can get your hands on—even starting the game comes at a cost.



But remember, in this world, nothing comes for free. Pressing start costs money, and even other players aren't safe from your greed—you can steal their hard-earned cash to fuel your own quest for wealth and power.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GT or AMD HD 3870 512MB or higher
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GT or AMD HD 3870 512MB or higher
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
